inference:
The pie graph shows that $1/5$ of the allowance was spent on burgers.
Since I had $\$30$ in allowance, I spent \frac{1}{5}\cdot30=6 \ \text{dollars}$ on burgers.
Final Answer: $\boxed{6}.$ I hope it is correct.
ground_truth: Because $\frac{1}{3}$ of the money was spent on movies and there is 30 dollars, the amount of money spent on movies is $\frac{1}{3} \cdot 30=10$ dollars. Likewise, $\frac{3}{10} \cdot 30=9$ dollars were spent on music and $\frac{1}{5} \cdot 30 = 6$ dollars were spent on ice cream. Thus, the total amount of money spent on movies, music, and ice cream is $\$10+\$9+\$6=\$25$. The remaining amount of money is spent on burgers. Thus, the money spent on burgers is $\$30-\$25=\$\boxed{5}$.
